statements: SELECT * FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT publication_name, printer_model FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT publication_name, maintenance_due_date FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule WHERE printer_model='PrinterABC';
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_due_date DESC;

SELECT publication_name, printer_model, DATEDIFF(maintenance_due_date, last_serviced_date) AS days_since_last_service FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), maintenance_due_date) > 7;
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule WHERE publication_id = 1;
SELECT publication_id, publication_name FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_due_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT publication_name, printer_model FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule WHERE last_serviced_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_due_date DESC, last_serviced_date ASC;
SELECT publication_name, maintenance_due_date FROM PrintMediaMaintenanceSchedule WHERE publication_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM printing_technology;
SELECT technology_name, manufacturer FROM printing_technology WHERE maintenance_interval > 6;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY next_service_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, technician_name FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE last_service_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT technology_name, manufacturer, maintenance_interval FROM printing_technology WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM printing_technology WHERE id = 1;
SELECT technology_name, manufacturer FROM printing_technology WHERE maintenance_interval > 6;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE technician_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT technology_id, last_service_date, next_service_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY last_service_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_printers FROM printing_technology GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_printers > 2;
SELECT * FROM Print_Publications;
SELECT publication_name, publication_type FROM Print_Publications;
SELECT publication_name, publication_frequency FROM Print_Publications ORDER BY publication_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'Canon';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_interval FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_interval < 6;
SELECT publication_name, publication_type FROM Print_Publications;
SELECT * FROM Print_Publications WHERE publication_type='Magazine';
SELECT publication_name, publication_frequency FROM Print_Publications ORDER BY publication_frequency DESC;
SELECT publication_name, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Print_Publications, Equipment WHERE Print_Publications.publication_id = 1 AND Equipment.equipment_id = 1;

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, Maintenance_Schedule.service_date, Maintenance_Schedule.service_description FROM Equipment JOIN Maintenance_Schedule ON Equipment.equipment_id = Maintenance_Schedule.equipment_id ORDER BY Maintenance_Schedule.service_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PrintingTechnology ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer';
SELECT publication_name, editor FROM PrintPublications WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM PrintingTechnology WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Annual Service' AND technician = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM PrintingTechnology WHERE manufacturer = 'Canon';
SELECT publication_name, editor FROM PrintPublications WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, last_maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenance ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT technology_name, manufacturer FROM PrintingTechnology WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010 AND year_of_manufacture < 2020;
SELECT publication_name, publication_frequency FROM PrintPublications WHERE editor LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY publication_frequency ASC;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentSchedule;
SELECT publication_name, publication_type FROM Publication;
SELECT equipment_name, service_date FROM EquipmentSchedule WHERE service_interval > 30;
SELECT technology_name, model, manufacturer FROM PrintingTechnology ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine';
SELECT * FROM Publication WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT publication_name, publication_type FROM Publication ORDER BY publication_name DESC;
SELECT p.publication_name, m.maintenance_type FROM Publication p JOIN MaintenanceLog m ON p.id = m.equipment_id;
SELECT DISTINCT technology_type FROM PrintingTechnology;
SELECT ps.equipment_name, ps.service_date, ml.maintenance_type FROM EquipmentSchedule ps LEFT JOIN MaintenanceLog ml ON ps.id = ml.equipment_id;
